data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marin, Ivan (2008): Notes on morphology and ecological difference between species of pontoniine shrimp genus Crinotonia Marin (Caridea: Palaemonidae) associated with shallow-water feather stars Phanogenia spp. (Crinoidea: Comasteridae). Zootaxa 1764: 19-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181984
